DOC.brief_summary: Multicenter Study Safety Efficacy Human Anti-TNF Monoclonal Antibody Adalimumab Subjects Moderately Severely Active Psoriatic Arthritis
DOC.brief_title: Study Safety Efficacy Human Anti-TNF Monoclonal Antibody Adalimumab Subjects With Moderately Severely Active Psoriatic Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Moderate severe PsA Inadequate response DMARD therapy Corticosteroid stable dose < = 10 mg QD DMARDs must take 3 month stable dose 4 week MTX maximum dose = < = 30 mg/week Active chronic plaque PS document history chronic plaque PS No active skin disease
